nodes.text: Star Wars: Beware the Sith is a 96-page Dorling Kindersley book written by Shari Last explaining the stats, powers, motives, and plans of the Sith as depicted in the 6 Star Wars films. The book was released on February 20, 2012.
Discover the dangerous secrets of the dark side of the Force. Meet the most terrifying Sith Lords of all time and find out all about their plots, weapons, duels, allies, and conspiracies.
